fields.description: Organization Name. This field is read-only and should not be post back in Put Organization ID Request.

This option is only allowed for Supervisory Organization at the moment. When set to true, Supervisory Organizations will have Organization Reference ID suffixed to their names. A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of current moment.

Include_Organization_ID_in_Name.description: This option is only allowed for Supervisory Organization at the moment. When set to true, Supervisory Organizations will have Organization Reference ID suffixed to their names. A new effective-dated organization name is automatically created if value for this field is different as of current moment.

Organization_Name.description: Organization Name. This field is read-only and should not be post back in Put Organization ID Request.
